c74object.name: 264.go!
c74object.description: A simple button to send bangs from your MIDI controller.

inlet.description: Any input causes the graphical button to flash and a bang to be output.

outlet.description: Outputs a bang on input, click or MIDI button press (bang on 127).

objarg.name: unique id
objarg.description: A unique name allows the module to communicate with the 264 Tools preset mechanisms.

c74object.discussion: Used in a bpatcher, 264.go! allows you to quickly link a MIDI controller button to your patch to trigger bangs.
